reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP Decorator Triple Rocker Light Switch, Three Single Pole Electrical Paddle Switch, 15A 120V, in-Wall On/Off Switch, Self-grounding, Wall Plate is Included, UL Listed (1 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: I installed this to restore a bathroom electric light/fan/heater. Once installed I found all switches functioned, but were very flimsy. After just a few cycles one of the switches failed short (on) and since it was connected to the heater it caused that unit to run continuously. Fortunately I was present for the failure and able to de-energize the circuit in time to prevent overheating. This could have caused a fire otherwise. I question the UL listing on this device. It replaced a switch that lasted 40 years, and only worked for a week with less than a dozen cycles. Cheap, shoddy, and dangerous.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2024
reviews.title: Safety hazard - switch shorted open

reviews.text: Higher quality than what I thought it would be. And the "press-in" connections on this are really nice. Just slip in the slot, screw the clamp down. Way easier than wrapping the wires around the screws and better than the press in ones that are just a barb that holds it in that no one should trust. Switches feel nice too.

reviews.productTitle: ELEGRP Decorator Triple Rocker Light Switch, Three Single Pole Electrical Paddle Switch, 15A 120V, in-Wall On/Off Switch, Self-grounding, Wall Plate is Included, UL Listed (1 Pack, Glossy White)
reviews.text: I bought a Broan bathroom fan, not realizing that with a humidity-sensing feature and a light in the unit, additional wiring would have to be run. Running the extra wiring makes the installation a chore, but no fault of the switch. This switch did the trick, and was much lower cost than the Broan switch, or switches from the big box stores. You do not need a special overpriced switch from Broan, as they would lead you to believe.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.title: Worked for Broan bathroom fan installation
